title: A Love Like Nun Other
description: LeoShe’s too good for me…pure and innocent. SophiaHe shouldn’t want a woman like me.LeoI’ve had my share of women.SophiaI’m a virgin.LeoShe makes me want to be a better man.SophiaHe makes me want to be a bad girl.When a sexy, soccer player falls in love with a former nun, will their very different pasts pull them apart?
author: Angela Nicole
